music¶

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

Music

The base class that all cogs must inherit from.

Functions¶

setup(bot)

class music.Music(bot)¶

Bases: discord.ext.commands.Cog

The base class that all cogs must inherit from.

A cog is a collection of commands, listeners, and optional state to help group commands together. More information on them can be found on the Cogs page.

When inheriting from this class, the options shown in CogMeta are equally valid here.

display_emoji(self)¶
Return type

discord.PartialEmoji

await cog_before_invoke(self, ctx)¶

Coroutine called before command invocation. We mainly just want to check whether the user is in the players controller channel.

await join(self, ctx)¶

Joins the voice channel

await leave(self, ctx)¶

Disconnects from a voice channel

await play(self, ctx, *, url)¶

Plays the requested music

await pause(self, ctx)¶

Pauses the current music playing

await resume(self, ctx)¶

Resumes music

await stop(self, ctx)¶

Stops the Music Player

await loop(self, ctx)¶

Iterates the current playing song

await queue(self, ctx)¶

Displays the songs queue

await np(self, ctx)¶

Gives info about current playing song

await skip(self, ctx)¶

Skips the current playing song

await volume(self, ctx, vol)¶

Changes the volume for the current song Note: Negative volume numbers will be converted to 0

Parameters
